p: Data used here are publicly available from the Earth System Grid Federation website ( https://www.earthsystemgrid.org/home.html). SLR projections were generated using ProjectSL ( https://github.com/bobkopp/ProjectSL) and LocalizeSL ( https://github.com/bobkopp/LocalizeSL). Researchers interested in downscaled fields may contact coauthors K.A.E. or A.J.G. via email with their request.
